    JoiningDate         *time.Time         `json:"joiningDate" bson:"joiningDate,omitempty"`
	ProbationaryendDate time.Time          `json:"probationaryendDate" bson:"probationaryendDate,omitempty"`
	ConfirmationDate    time.Time          `json:"confirmationDate" bson:"confirmationDate,omitempty"`
	BenchstartDate      time.Time          `json:"benchstartDate" bson:"benchstartDate,omitempty"`
	BenchendDate        time.Time          `json:"benchendDate" bson:"benchendDate,omitempty"`
	NoticeDate          time.Time          `json:"noticeDate" bson:"noticeDate,omitempty"`
	RelieveDate         time.Time          `json:"relieveDate" bson:"relieveDate,omitempty"`
